title: Serve a Subpoena
description: A paralegal needs to arrange for a third-party witness to be served with a deposition subpoena.

tasks.description: Draft the deposition subpoena with the correct witness name, date, time, and location of the deposition.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent prepares a legally sufficient subpoena.

tasks.description: Contact a registered process server and provide them with the subpoena and the witness's last known address.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully hires and instructs a process server.

tasks.description: Once the process server serves the subpoena, receive and file the 'Proof of Service' with the court.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent completes the service process by filing the required proof with the court.
